Getting Started¬∂

‚ú® Welcome to LevelSight! Follow these simple steps to set up and start using this game analytics tool.

Prerequisites¬∂

Before you begin, make sure you have:

  1. üêç Python: Version 3.8 or higher installed.

  2. üì¶ Required Libraries: pandas, matplotlib.

Installation¬∂

  1. Clone the Repository Download LevelSight to your local machine:

    git clone https://github.com/nabilachemansor/levelSight-simple-game-analytic-tool.git

cd levelSight-simple-game-analytic-tool

  1. Install Dependecies Install the necessary libraries:

pip install -r requirements.txt

  1. Run levelSight Launch the tool and start analyzing.

levelSight
